name: sfpwowerscript-managescratchorg-task
description: Helper task to Create/Delete a scratch org, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Read more about this task here https://sfpowerscripts.com/tasks/common-utility-tasks/create%20and%20delete%20a%20scratch%20org
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action

options.Delete: Delete an earlier created scratch org

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action required to operate on scratchorg

inputs.name: config_file_path
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the current working directory containing  config file for the scratch org

inputs.name: alias
inputs.label: Alias of the scratch org to be created
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias of the scratch org to be created

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the scratch org to be deleted

inputs.name: devhub_alias
inputs.label: Alias/Username of the devhub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the alias of the devhub previously authenticated, default value is HubOrg if using the Authenticate Devhub task

inputs.name: maintainorg
inputs.label: Select an option for deleting this scratch org

options.delete: Delete this org after all subsequent tasks are executed
options.maintain: Maintain this org for x number of days
options.donothing: Do Nothing, Deletion of the scratch org will be handled explicitly

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to delete the created scratchorg

inputs.name: daystomanintain
inputs.label: Number of days this scratch org has to be maintained
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the scratch org to be deleted

inputs.name: working_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Keep it blank in the build pipeline, pass the repo directory in the release pipeline

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_scratch_org_url
OutputVariables.description: The URL of the scratch org that was created

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_scratch_org_username
OutputVariables.description: The username of the scratch org that was created
